title: Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help
tags: ask the goblin priestess for help
content:
way Priestess Gut will help us now. We repelled Priestess Gut's mental probe. Not capable of understanding what ailed us, she told us she couldn't help. We left the area without seeing if the goblin priestess could heal us.

Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help Walkthrough

Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help is a subquest for the Main Quest: Find a Cure

Head into the Shattered Sanctum and you will find the High Priestess of the Absolute, True Soul Gut at the end of the hall and speak with her and
